Ted Dziuba wrote:
>
> We have a few Heritrix instances set up in Amazon EC2 crawling a fairly
> small amount of data. We are seeing the crawl pause itself as it goes,
> with no indication as to why in the crawl log. What could cause this?
>
> Thanks for any pointers.
>
> Ted
>
>
